entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing Bare Metal system changes in the Silicon Valley location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-08-18 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-08-18 22:00:00 UTC

Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.

Event Type: Network Maintenance

We are performing BareMetal system changes in the Miami location during the following maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-08-17 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-08-17 22:00:00 UTC


Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.
